Reviews.Title: beware
Reviews.Author: goddessgina77
Reviews.Content: beware of your phone arriving and not being able to activate it.  The code was not in sprint's system.  Although it says its a sprint phone.  Unable to activate.

Reviews.Title: SUCKS.
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: It was described as "very good condition" yet the volume buttons are missing, theres a crack in the screen and it freezes every 10 seconds. it doesnt even let me place a call without freezing and the battery life lasts like 4-5 hours. horrible phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone for My 14 Year Old
Reviews.Author: melinda honeychild
Reviews.Content: He likes the option of using either the slide out keyboard or the touchscreen. No complaints from him, which I take as a good thing.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Transform SPH-M920 Sprint Android Cell Phone
